text:
HAPPY SUNDAY, EVERYONE!
Turn on @WTNH from 6-8am for a look back at #LarryKing's incredible life.  We also have guidance for grandparents looking to see their family after receiving the #COVID19 #vaccine.  And, will we see snow this week?  @Ash_Baylor has the answer!  Join us!❄️ https://t.co/mI7NKkUiYU
